medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began as generalized abdominal discomfort and progressed to sharp, non-radiating right lower quadrant pain that worsened with movement. Today, the patient noted a worse appetite associated with nausea, but denies diarrhea, constipation, dysuria, hematuria, fevers/chills, or blood in stool.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Anxiety/depression, Chiari malformation, epilepsy until age unspecified. Past surgical history: none.
